name: Boucle Chair - Merlot
description: Upholstered in a textural merlot fabric, our Boucle Chair is a timeless piece inspired by our favourite mid-century designs. Understated luxury is found in the simple curves which are complimented by the fabric piping detailing. Crafted in Europe to ensure optimum comfort, it is upholstered in the finest boucle fabric. Also available in White Boucle & Camel Boucle.
